text: Giunta in 1986 Ana María Giunta (1 March 1943 - 14 March 2015) was an Argentine actress, best known for her roles in A King and His Movie (1986), The Supporter (1991), and in Eversmile, New Jersey (1989). Giunta was born in Concepción del Uruguay, Argentina, and died in Buenos Aires, Argentina from respiratory failure, aged 72.Murió Ana María Giunta, pagina12.com.ar; accessed 27 March 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1943 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Argentine film actresses Category:People from Uruguay Department Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease- related deaths in Argentina
title: Ana María Giunta
